abstract.original_text: The term is derived from the Greek word for "alternative"-para and for "mucus"-myxo. 2. Syncytium A syncytium (pl., syncytia) refers to a multinucleated cell that can result from multiple cell fusions of uninuclear cells. The term is derived from the Greek word for "together"-syn and for "box (cell)"-kytos.

sentences.segment_text: The term is derived from the Greek word for `` alternative '' - para and for `` mucus '' - myxo .
Syncytium A syncytium ( pl. , syncytia ) refers to a multinucleated cell that can result from multiple cell fusions of uninuclear cells .
The term is derived from the Greek word for `` together '' - syn and for `` box ( cell ) '' - kytos .
